text: Ezɨ Niniven gumazamiziba Godɨn akar kam nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia, egha kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “E dagheba ategham. E bar moghɨra, gumazir dapaniba ko gumazir kɨniba uaghara, e azir korotiabar aghuigh, egh uan azirakar kam akaghtɨ, God fogh suam, e guizbangɨra navibagh iragha gɨfa.” Egha me mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, ami.
